title: 【搬运】Fubuki-class destroyer "Fubuki"
author: 达斯·龙须
txt_content:
[ Fubuki-class destroyer "Fubuki" -吹雪级驱逐舰“吹雪” ]
 作者原文：This time my new ship is the destroyer Fubuki, also known as the name ship of 24 sister ships. Fubuki had also been described as the world's first modern destroyer and set a new standard for destroyers around the world. 
There is a schematic file so please feel free to download it. There is also TNT cannon on the ship but if you don't know much about it, I don't recommend touching it. You also need the HARIBOTE AIR CRAFT MOD to turn the turrets. 
Note: ** on the screenshots have crazily detailed torpedo launcher, but since it was made large and shrunk with mod, the schematic only contains ** with the usually sized torpedo launchers.
译文：这一次我的新船是驱逐舰吹雪，也被称为24艘姐妹船的名字。吹雪也被描述为世界上第一艘现代驱逐舰，并为世界各地的驱逐舰设定了新的标准。
有一个示意图文件，请下载。船上也有TNT加农炮，但是如果你不太了解的话，我不建议你去碰它。你还需要HARIBOTE AIR CRAFT MOD来转动炮塔。

注意:屏幕上的那个有疯狂的详细的鱼雷发射器，但是由于它是用mod做的大的和收缩的，示意图只包含一个通常大小的鱼雷发射器。
—达斯·龙须译 本人水平不高，如有错误，请多指教



[ Picture - 美图欣赏 ] 



-图源自原帖-


[ Information - 关于作品 ] 
地图作者：Yamada-Ken
地图官网：https://www.planetminecraft.com/ ... er-fubuki/#comments

官方/国内下载地址：
[官方]https://www.planetminecraft.com/project/fubuki-class-destroyer-fubuki/download/schematic/
[国内]https://pan.baidu.com/s/1pp6M8iHyFN0a5RlcuM-Vwg

授权信息:




 [ Install - 地图安装 ]
Save存档(正版用户):
1、关闭Minecraft，
2、在Windows资源管理器的路径中输入 %appdata%/.minecraft 。
3、把下载的地图存档解压缩放到. minecraft\saves 文件夹里面。

Schematics存档：
这类型需要MCEdit。
1、下载完成后解压，
2、关闭Minecraft，
3、打开MCEdit.exe，点击下方import按钮，选择你下载的文件，
     最后点import，按Ctrl+s保存，Ctrl+w关掉存档，点Quit退出。

- 本地图请使用第二种"Schematics存档"方法安装使用 -

replies.txt_content: 光看图觉得船做的还不错
